sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Related articles

- Mirrors

These mirrors are not listed by default in /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist, therefore not distributed within pacman-mirrorlist.

sections.title: Up to date
sections.content: Up to date mirrors have the latest packages, and remain synchronised with the official arch repositories. These mirrors can be used like any official mirror distributed by pacman-mirrorlist.

sections.title: Worldwide
sections.content: - https://cloudflaremirrors.com/archlinux/ - CloudFlare runs a quasi-mirror service that fronts existing mirrors on their global CDN (might not work correctly with pacman, see FS#67865)

sections.title: China
sections.content:
CDN

- https://mirrors.cloud.tencent.com/archlinux/ - Tencent Cloud
- https://repo.huaweicloud.com/archlinux/ - Huawei Cloud

Cernet

- https://mirror.bit.edu.cn/archlinux/ - Beijing Institute of Technology

sections.title: Japan
sections.content:
- http://ftp.nara.wide.ad.jp/pub/Linux/archlinux/ - Nara Institute of Science and Technology (http only, IPv4/IPv6 support)
- https://ftp.kddilabs.jp/Linux/packages/archlinux/ - (http and https support, IPv4 only)
- https://srv2.ftp.ne.jp/Linux/packages/archlinux/ - (http and https support, IPv4 only)

sections.title: Netherlands
sections.content:
- https://mirror.transip.net/archlinux/ TransIP B.V. (HTTP and HTTPS support, IPv4/IPv6 support)
- https://mirror.previder.nl/archlinux/ Previder B.V. (HTTP and HTTPS support, IPv4/IPv6 support)

sections.title: South Africa
sections.content:
- http://ftp.leg.uct.ac.za/pub/linux/arch/ - University of Cape Town
- https://mirror.ufs.ac.za/archlinux/ - University of the Free State
- https://archlinux.mirror.ac.za - TENET - Tertiary Education and Research Network of South Africa

sections.title: United States
sections.content:
- http://mirror.pointysoftware.net/archlinux/
- http://mirror.ziemer.bz/archlinux
- https://lug.mines.edu/mirrors/archlinux/
- http://mirror.cs.umn.edu/arch/[dead link 2025-03-15 â“˜]
- https://arch.linux.ucla.edu/ - University of California, Los Angeles

sections.title: Out of date
sections.content: Out of date mirrors do not have the latest packages, these are either no longer maintained, or designed to distribute older packages which are no longer available within the official mirrors.

sections.title: Worldwide
sections.content: - https://sourceforge.net/projects/archlinux/files/ - ISO files only; Does not have any releases since 2006. Use it only for getting older ISOs.
